name: MilieuClimateSmartThermostat
0:
”Alexa, make it warmer in here”
”Alexa, set bedroom thermostat to 20”
”Alexa, set living room thermostat to automatic”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control your Milieu Climate smart thermostat by using Alexa! Using voice commands you can change the thermostat between modes like Heat, Cool, Auto and Off. You can set temperature up or down and ask Alexa to tell you your current room temperature.
To get started, click the “Enable skill” button in the Alexa app and then link your Milieu Climate Mobile App account.
If you have any questions visit www.milieulabs.com.au/support

When using the skill, you need to specify the name of the Milieu Climate Smart Thermostat. The name of the thermostat is under system settings. You would have set this name when setting up Milieu Climate. You can change the name of your thermostat to pre-defined names or a custom name that is easy to say. If you have named your Milieu Climate Smart Thermostat “My Home” Just say “Alexa set My Home to Cool mode” or “Alexa, set My Home to 22 degrees”

More examples
Alexa, set My Home to Heat mode.
Alexa, set My Home to Cool mode.
Alexa, set My Home to Auto mode.
Alexa, set My Home to 25 degrees.
Alexa, make My Home warmer.
Alexa, Make My Home cooler.
